summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsGive BackThe Bean Cream from Mixsoon is a rich, fast-absorbing cream deeply moisturizes and nourishes dry, rough skin. Formulated with fermented soybean extract, it helps balance oil and moisture levels and revitalize dull skin.
details: DetailsBenefitsDelivers deep, long-lasting hydrationSoftens the look of fine lines and early agingRepairing the skin barrier to prevent moisture lossCalms visible redness and soothes sensitive skinLeaves skin soft, plump, and dewyKey IngredientsSoybean Fermented Extract – Boosts hydration, supports firmness, and strengthens the moisture barrierBarley Seed Ferment Filtrate – Deeply hydrates, enhances elasticity, and soothes visible irritationShea Butter – Delivers rich moisture and smooths rough, dry skinCeramides – Lock in hydration and reinforce the skin’s protective barrierPanthenol (Pro-Vitamin B5) – Calms redness, restores balance, and supports sensitive skin recoveryItem 2643836How To UseAfter applying toner, as the last step of your skincare routine take an appropriate amount of the cream. Apply and spread evenly onto the face. Tap lightly to ensure absorption.IngredientsWater, Glycerin, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Polyglyceryl-3 Distearate, Glyceryl Stearate Citrate, Hydrogenated Coco-Glycerides, Limnanthes Alba (Meadowfoam) Seed Oil, Butylene Glycol, Diisostearyl Malate, Vinyl Dimethicone, Lactobacillus/Soybean Ferment Extract, Lactobacillus/Punica Granatum Fruit Ferment Extract, Saccharomyces/Barley Seed Ferment Filtrate, Lactobacillus/Pear Juice Ferment Filtrate, Panthenol, Dipotassium Glycyrrhizate, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Melia Azadirachta Flower Extract, Ocimum Sanctum Leaf Extract, Melia Azadirachta Leaf Extract, Curcuma Longa (Turmeric) Root Extract, Corallina Officinalis Extract, Eclipta Prostrata Extract, Coccinia Indica Fruit Extract, Ethylhexylglycerin, Citrus Aurantium Bergamia (Bergamot) Fruit Oil, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Oil, Anthemis Nobilis Flower Oil, Stearic Acid, Palmitic Acid, Oleic Acid, Cetearyl Alcohol, Hydroxyethyl Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Glyceryl Stearate, Hydroxyacetophenone, Sorbitan Isostearate, Carbomer, Tromethamine, Propanediol, Adenosine, Disodium Edta, Sodium Polyacrylate.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: After applying toner, as the last step of your skincare routine take an appropriate amount of the cream. Apply and spread evenly onto the face. Tap lightly to ensure absorption.

faceoff_positive.comments: This is my first time using Mixsoon n I love all their products my face is much smoother and very soft I will continue to use it. I ordered the whole package the toner, essence, bean essence and the moisturizer plus eye cream. The price on this product is also very affordable compared to other Korean brands I love this product I recommend it.
faceoff_positive.headline: Mixsoon Bean Cream 50 ml

faceoff_negative.comments: Hello,I received my order and I have started using it and love it! I have noticed a difference in the few days I have started to use it but am disappointed in the cream. I opened it and have been using very little every day, not even a drop size and when I finally settled the bottled, I noticed there is not even half the bottle filled with cream. I am sending a picture of the bottle with the cream in it for reference. As you can see how much cream came on the bottle. This is very deceiving and disappointing as it looked to be a full bottle when it came. And as you can see it hasn't even been 4 days since this has been delivered. I would appreciate it if someone would address this concern as this is my only complaint of your product so far.Thank you Gauri Patel
faceoff_negative.headline: Mixsoon Bean Cream 50 ml
